name: 7.1.3.4.13. Other Outsiders
content:
@Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.dS0UkKOINqI2iTDX]{(Index) Magic}

@Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.zCeqoMSKdZ8r4EPd]{7.1. Mastering Magic}

  • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.Sz0GZaZV3zxb9UTY]{7.1.3. Binding Outsiders}
    • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.M5p2I9If5lZHg5iI]{7.1.3.4. Outsider Categories}
      • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.7ajO1mDHRnt1zwri]{7.1.3.4.01. Aeon}
      • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.CQQmNNUsLaq64ISd]{7.1.3.4.02. Agathion}
      • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.doRTEmrFcb3Jpd6H]{7.1.3.4.03. Angels}
      • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.vWKMVgMS2JLVFhSW]{7.1.3.4.04. Archons}
      • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.ALU8fOwwjVflaV63]{7.1.3.4.05. Azata}
      • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.Jc9NeIDhX4EJy4NY]{7.1.3.4.06. Daemons}
      • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.rlk3otEreOuYoI8n]{7.1.3.4.07. Demons}
      • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.iNa7owekV9rX5NlO]{7.1.3.4.08. Devils}
      • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.pJMFHXBSpUdPcgW2]{7.1.3.4.09. Elementals and Genies}
      • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.bxArpGfr07tVDIL4]{7.1.3.4.10. Inevitables}
      • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.rA6iR7Xbug6TMgZk]{7.1.3.4.11. Proteans}
      • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.J4sDwQBfloYeVUD2]{7.1.3.4.12. Qlippoth}
      • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.zMmfoLzjryBQtFrg]{7.1.3.4.13. Other Outsiders}

Source Ultimate Magic pg. 110

While the groups above detail all the major types of outsiders, the Great Beyond is called great for a reason, and there are countless other outsiders that a potential binder can call. In theory, any outsider can be called and a binder can attempt to press that creature into service, though the proper strategy for doing so is contingent on the abilities, desires, and goals of the particular outsider.

 

There is one group of outsiders that it is more difficult to bind: the native outsider. A native outsider cannot be called and bound from the Material Plane. In order to call any outsider, it must be on a different plane from the binder. Native outsiders (or other outsiders currently manifesting on the Material Plane) can only be called and bound by spellcasters on a different plane.
